The Longman anthology of world literature /
Vol B has publisher: Pearson Longman.
Accompanying compact discs contain both music and spoken word selection illustrating the text.
Title on accompanying CD: Voices of world literature.
Vol. A. The ancient world -- v. B. The medieval era -- v. C. The early modern period -- v. D. The seventeenth and eighteenth centuries -- v. E. The nineteenth century -- v. F. The twentieth century.
